name: Paris, France
short_description: The city of love, iconic for the Eiffel Tower and romantic streets.
description: Paris is known for its art, fashion, gastronomy, and culture. Explore the Louvre, Eiffel Tower, and charming old streets.
best_time_to_visit: April to June, September to November

name: Tokyo, Japan
short_description: A perfect mix of modern skyscrapers and ancient temples.
description: Tokyo offers high-tech city life, traditional shrines, delicious sushi, and beautiful cherry blossoms.
best_time_to_visit: March to May, October to November

name: Bali, Indonesia
short_description: Famous for beaches, temples, culture, and natural beauty.
description: Bali is a tropical paradise with volcanoes, beaches, coral reefs, and friendly local culture.

name: New York City, USA
short_description: The city that never sleeps with iconic places like Times Square.
description: NYC offers skyscrapers, culture, Broadway, shopping, and diverse food experiences.
best_time_to_visit: April to June, September to early November

name: Sydney, Australia
short_description: Home to the Sydney Opera House and Harbour Bridge.
description: Sydney blends beaches, vibrant city life, nature, and popular landmarks.
best_time_to_visit: September to November, March to May

name: London, UK
short_description: A global city with history, museums, and famous landmarks.
description: Visit the London Eye, Big Ben, Buckingham Palace, and explore rich British culture.

name: Dubai, UAE
short_description: City of luxury, skyscrapers, and desert adventures.
description: Dubai offers futuristic architecture, shopping malls, safaris, and the Burj Khalifa.

name: Rome, Italy
short_description: Explore ancient ruins like the Colosseum.
description: Rome is full of history, culture, architecture, and delicious Italian cuisine.
best_time_to_visit: April to June, September to October

name: Santorini, Greece
short_description: Famous for blue-domed white houses and sunsets.
description: Santorini offers beaches, volcanic landscapes, luxury stays, and breathtaking sunsets.

name: Maldives
short_description: World-famous for crystal-clear water and luxury resorts.
description: Maldives is a paradise for honeymooners with underwater villas and beautiful marine life.

name: Bangkok, Thailand
short_description: A vibrant city with temples and amazing food culture.
description: Bangkok mixes modern city vibes with temples, markets, nightlife, and river cruises.

name: Seoul, South Korea
short_description: Modern technology meets K-culture and tradition.
description: Seoul is famous for K-pop, palaces, markets, and beautiful seasons.
best_time_to_visit: March to May, September to November

name: Istanbul, Turkey
short_description: The city between Europe and Asia.
description: Istanbul offers mosques, bazaars, historical architecture, and rich culture.
best_time_to_visit: April to May, September to October

name: Kathmandu, Nepal
short_description: Gateway to the Himalayas and rich traditions.
description: Kathmandu is full of temples, culture, spiritual sites, and mountain views.

name: Cape Town, South Africa
short_description: Mountains, beaches, and wildlife in one place.
description: Cape Town offers Table Mountain, beaches, wine tours, and scenic beauty.
best_time_to_visit: March to May, September to November

name: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
short_description: Home to Christ the Redeemer and vibrant culture.
description: Rio is known for Carnival festival, beaches like Copacabana, and mountain views.

name: Singapore
short_description: A futuristic city with clean streets and lush gardens.
description: Visit Marina Bay Sands, Sentosa Island, and Gardens by the Bay.

name: Hong Kong
short_description: Skyline views and vibrant nightlife.
description: Hong Kong offers shopping, mountain peaks, temples, and city experiences.

name: Phuket, Thailand
short_description: Beautiful beaches and island adventures.
description: Phuket is famous for beaches, nightlife, islands, and water activities.

name: Cox’s Bazar, Bangladesh
short_description: The longest natural sea beach in the world.
description: Cox’s Bazar offers long sandy beaches, seafood, markets, and marine drives.
